sorcer.service

Interface Evaluator<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Arg, Call, Evaluation<T>, EvaluationComponent, Request, Scopable, java.io.Serializable, Service, Substitutable, SupportComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AltInvoker, CallableInvoker, CmdInvoker, DoubleIncrementor, ExertInvoker, GroovyInvoker, IncrementInvoker, IntegerIncrementor, LoopInvoker, MethodInvoker, OptInvoker, RunnableInvoker, ServiceInvoker, Soma

    public interface Evaluator<T>
extends Evaluation<T>
    A functionality required by all evaluators in SORCER.
    Author:
    Mike Sobolewski
